hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path of #time#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Deku Tree#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Requiem of Spirit#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Green Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a sandy grotto with #fragile walls#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Epona's Song#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Epona's Song#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #0# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Magic Meter#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #lighting flames in the royal tomb# rewards #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Bow#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #12# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #the hero#.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Theater

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that most of the water in Hyrule flows through King Zora's buttocks.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Map of the Spirit Temple#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Before Heavy Block Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Shortcut Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Magic Meter#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Song of Storms# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.
